statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerInformation;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM CustomerInformation WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM CustomerInformation ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM CustomerInformation WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM CustomerInformation WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM CustomerInformation WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM CustomerInformation WHERE customer_id > 50;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInformation WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM CustomerInformation WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number FROM CustomerInformation WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 10 AND 50;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM customers LEFT JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, payment_date, amount_paid, payment_method FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN payments ON orders.order_id = payments.order_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1500;
SELECT MAX(amount_paid) AS max_payment, MIN(amount_paid) AS min_payment FROM payments;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(order_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM order_items WHERE quantity >= 5 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, amount FROM payments WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC, order_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM order_items WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, amount FROM payments WHERE amount BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Product ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Order WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM Order_Items WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customer WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Product ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, o.order_date, p.product_name, oi.quantity FROM Customer c JOIN 'Order' o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN Order_Items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN Product p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT DISTINCT p.product_name FROM Product p INNER JOIN Order_Items oi ON p.product_id = oi.product_id WHERE oi.quantity > 5;
